Reading List

Reading to me is a window into other worlds. This section will house my current favorite articles, books, podcasts, or newsletters I've read. Yes, I know podcasts don't count as reading, but I think they serve much of the same purpose as reading. These will not encompass all the articles and things I am reading, as the list might be tedious to scroll through. I will send out the full weekly list in my newsletters. Many of my favorite science fiction/fantasy books will be listed on the about me portion of my website.

Articles

Matthew Ball - Nine Reasons Why Disney+ Will Succeed

David Perell - The Fruits of Friendship

Seeking Alpha - Disney sets the stage for battle with Amazon and Netflix - an interesting take on how Disney+ will compete with some of the DTC behemoths, even if I disagree that Disney will not be a direct competitor...

Benedict Evans - Tesla, software, and disruption

Mark Andreesen's Guide to Startups

Steve Kaplan - Which CEO Characteristics and Abilities Matter

Books

Ben Horowitz - The Hard Thing About Hard Things

Youngme Moon - Different: Escaping the Competitive Herd

Cixin Liu - The Three-Body Problem

Podcasts

Forbes - How the Former Starbucks CEO's Early Experiences Shaped his World View

A16z - For the Billions of Creatives Out There

Bloomberg Masters In Business - Ray Dalio Live

Bloomberg Masters in Business - Ralph Scamardella on the High-End Food Business

A16z - Gaming Goes Mainstream

Exponent - Family-Friendly Disney

A16z - Stories and Lessons in Enterprise Sales

A16z - The Business of Cybercrime
